name: Pinballz Exam Game
description:
Controls:

Left Paddle: Z

Right Paddle: /

Fire Ball: Space

Turbo Boost: Space

References:

- Background music from > https://www.melodyloops.com/my-music/longoloops/funny-adventure/

- Button click Sfx from > https://elements.envato.com/menu-click-2FCRR7Z?utm_source=mixkit&utm_medium=refe...

- Circle collision, plunger Sfx by Kenny from > https://opengameart.org/content/50-rpg-sound-effects

- Pipe Sfx from > https://www.raywenderlich.com/whats-new

- 1st Enterprise Font from > https://www.dafont.com/1st-enterprises.font

- Black hole arts by Cethiel from > https://opengameart.org/content/water-magic-effec

- All other arts by Jastine Laksmono

Levels:

1. Basic Bumpers (No additions)

2. Black Holes

3. Cinemachine Camera

4. 3-hit Bumper

5. Checkpoints

6. Tripwire

7. Launcher

8. Multi-ball

9. Dead-end Pipe 

10. Teleport (has ball scaling feature, green hole->bigger size, purple hole->smaller size)
